Project.shortdesc: The EPICS project is a collaboration of representatives throughout the North East of England (NE) educational sectors (within and between FE/HE) who propose a scalable and sustainable regional pilot project in personal development planning (PDP) and ePortfolios to support learners at all levels of post-16 education.
Project.name: EPICS - North East regional collaboration around e-portfolio progression pathways with illustrative studies
